trans-unit.source: Features supported on JDBC 4.1 and above

seg-source.mrk: Features supported on JDBC 4.1 and above

target.mrk: Features supported on JDBC 4.1 and above

trans-unit.source: JDBC 4.1 added some functionality to the core API. This section documents the JDBC 4.1 features supported by <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

seg-source.mrk: JDBC 4.1 added some functionality to the core API.
This section documents the JDBC 4.1 features supported by <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

target.mrk: JDBC 4.1 added some functionality to the core API.
This section documents the JDBC 4.1 features supported by <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

trans-unit.source: For information on features supported by all releases of JDBC 4, see <xref href="rrefjdbc4_0summary.dita#rrefjdbc4_0summary"></xref>. For information about features supported only by JDBC 4.2, see <xref href="rrefjdbc4_2summary.dita#rrefjdbc4_2summary"></xref>.

seg-source.mrk: For information on features supported by all releases of JDBC 4, see <xref href="rrefjdbc4_0summary.dita#rrefjdbc4_0summary"></xref>.
For information about features supported only by JDBC 4.2, see <xref href="rrefjdbc4_2summary.dita#rrefjdbc4_2summary"></xref>.

target.mrk: For information on features supported by all releases of JDBC 4, see <xref href="rrefjdbc4_0summary.dita#rrefjdbc4_0summary"></xref>.
For information about features supported only by JDBC 4.2, see <xref href="rrefjdbc4_2summary.dita#rrefjdbc4_2summary"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: JDBC 4.1 features are present only in a JDK 6 or higher environment.

seg-source.mrk: JDBC 4.1 features are present only in a JDK 6 or higher environment.

target.mrk: JDBC 4.1 features are present only in a JDK 6 or higher environment.
